    A

    Account - Class in financialManagement
    Represents a financial account with an ID and balance.
    Account(String, double) - Constructor for class financialManagement.Account
    Constructs a new Account with a specified account ID and initial balance.
    addNewCategory(String, double) - Method in class financialManagement.BudgetAnalysisManager
    Adds a new category with a specified name and budget if the category doesn't already exist.
    addNewExpense(String, String, double) - Method in class financialManagement.BudgetAnalysisManager
    Adds a new expense with a description, category, and amount if the category exists and the expense is not already entered.
    addReminder(String, LocalDateTime) - Method in class financialManagement.ReminderManager
    Adds a new reminder with a specified message and due date.
    App - Class in Unnamed Package
    This is the main class for the Nazamha (Budgeting Application) that facilitates user authentication, management of categories, expenses, transactions, reminders, and budget analysis.
    App() - Constructor for class App
     

    B

    BudgetAnalysisManager - Class in financialManagement
    Manages the analysis and tracking of a user's budget, categories, expenses, and transactions.
    BudgetAnalysisManager() - Constructor for class financialManagement.BudgetAnalysisManager
    Constructs a new BudgetAnalysisManager and initializes the lists of categories, expenses, transactions, and incomes.

    C

    Category - Class in financialManagement
    Represents a budget category with a name and a budget amount.
    Category(String, double) - Constructor for class financialManagement.Category
    Constructs a new Category with a specified name and budget.
    categoryExists(String) - Method in class financialManagement.BudgetAnalysisManager
    Checks if a category exists in the current list of categories.
    changePassword() - Method in class usermanagement.UserAccount
    Changes the password for the current user by validating the old password, entering a new one, and ensuring the new password matches the confirmation.

    D

    deposit(double) - Method in class financialManagement.Account
    Deposits the specified amount into this account, increasing the balance.
    doTransaction() - Method in class financialManagement.Transaction
    Executes a withdrawal transaction from the associated account, reducing the category's budget and the account balance.

    I

    isExpired() - Method in class financialManagement.ReminderManager.Reminder

    Transaction - Class in financialManagement

    U

    UltraSimpleUserStorage - Class in persistenceLayer

    User - Class in usermanagement
    This class represents a user with personal information such as name, email address, password, and phone number.

    Constructs a new User object with the specified information.
    UserAccount - Class in usermanagement

    Constructs a new UserAccount object for the specified user.
    usermanagement - package usermanagement
     
    UserServices - Class in usermanagement

    Constructs a new UserServices object for the specified user.

    V

    validPass(String) - Method in class usermanagement.UserAccount
    Validates the given password according to the following rules: Must be at least 8 characters long Must contain at least one uppercase letter Must contain at least one number Must contain at least one special character

    W

    withdraw(double) - Method in class financialManagement.Account
    Withdraws the specified amount from this account if sufficient funds are available.
